*Lab: pandas-intro*

In this lab you will learn some basic *pandas* functions for data analysis and manipulation. 

*pandas* is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming language.

::: {.callout-important}
Make sure you meet all the [requirements](/requirements.qmd) and have read the lecture [slides](/slide.qmd) before you start with the [assignments](/assignments.qmd) 
:::

In this lab you will learn how to use *pandas* to:

- Import and store data
- Change column names
- Change data types and add columns
- Calculate statistics and create plots
- Select data
- Filter, grouping and binning data
